title: Famous Windows "Ribbons" inspired screensaver made with JavaScript and Electron, supporting multiple platforms.
showDemo_btn: Show animation demo with default settings
sys_req_p: MacOS 10.15 Catalina, Windows 8/2012, Linux with modern kernel version (5.x) and Xserver (wayland is not supported)
usage_p: Ribbons Electron runs as a screensaver with idle system detection for fullscreen animation. Disable native screensavers to prevent conflicts.
